changelog:
## Fixed
- Wrap React app in Jellyfin plugin page structure (`data-role="page"`)
- Configuration page now displays correctly in Jellyfin's plugin settings

## Changes
- Added Jellyfin-compatible HTML structure to index.html template
- React app now renders properly within Jellyfin's configuration page iframe
description:
This plugin provides integration between Jellyfin and the Jellio service.
Community-maintained fork with Jellyfin 10.11.x support.
name: Jellio
